highlights: Developed microservices in Java for processing shipment confirmations and fulfilment statuses.
Built multiple RESTful APIs to support fetching order and shipment details retrieval and gift card processing workflows.
Designed and developed an automation testing framework with Cucumber, improving integration testing coverage across services.
Led upgrade of Java, Gradle, Camel and AWS libraries and wrote unit tests to improve code coverage.
Developed a configurable load testing platform to simulate workloads across REST APIs, Amazon SQS, S3 object uploads, and Kafka using Gatling and Scala.
Developed a Slack bot in Python using AWS Lambda and API Gateway to handle slash commands for common operational workflows.
Designed and implemented a Lambda function enabling multiple teams to monitor queues on Slack and reprocess DLQs, reducing compute and saving costs.
Designed and implemented a Golang web application with dashboard for tracking order fulfillment status.
Implemented a Go application for large-scale data migration from Elasticsearch to DynamoDB, including a dashboard for real-time tracking and progress.
Identified and executed multiple cloud cost-optimization strategies, achieving significant savings.
Developed Python scripts for synchronizing data between tables along with report generation for monitoring.
Implemented Java APIs for enabling seamless operations across a multi-tenant DB2 database.
Refactored a legacy web application to efficiently work with multiple databases, improving maintainability.
Implemented REST APIs for a custom store to onboard U.S. educational institutions for device procurement workflows.
Developed REST APIs for a content management system backed by Cassandra.
